original: eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ
analyzed: etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesa
translated: because of that will the equanimity faculty not arise in them there. In the last becomings of those in the Non-percipient, and of those men who, after showing themselves in some such form as this, will attain Nibbāna through the Joy Faculty,

original: tattha itthindriyañca na uppajjissati upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: tattha itthi indriyam ca na uppajjissati upekkhā indriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: the female faculty will not arise in them there and the equanimity faculty will not arise in them there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha upekkhindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha itthindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha upekkhindriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha itthi indriyam na uppajjissati iti
translated: Or alternatively, in the case of any person in whom the equanimity faculty does not arise, does it follow that the female faculty does not arise in him there?

original: Yā itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti
analyzed: yāḥ itthiyaḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti
translated: In the case of those women who, after showing themselves in some such form as this, will attain Nibbāna through the Joy Faculty,

original: tāsaṁ tattha upekkhindriyaṁ na uppajjissati, no ca tāsaṁ tattha itthindriyaṁ na uppajjissati.
analyzed: tāsam tattha upekkhindriyam na uppajjissati no ca tāsam tattha itthi indriyam na uppajjissati
translated: for them the faculty of equanimity does not arise there, but they do not not have the faculty of femininity.

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ ye ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam ye ca purisāḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
translated: Those in their last rebirth, and those Non-percipient Beings, and those who, having manifested this or that form,

original: somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ tattha upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati
analyzed: somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam tattha upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati
translated: are reborn in the form realms with joy and will attain final Nibbāna from there, for them the faculty of equanimity does not arise there,

original: itthindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: itthi indriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: and the faculty of femininity does not arise there.

original: Yassa yattha itthindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha saddhindriyaṁ …pe… paññindriyaṁ …pe… manindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa yattha itthi indriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha saddhindriyam pe paññindriyam pe manindriyam na uppajjissati iti
translated: In regard to those for whom the faculty of femininity does not arise, does the faculty of faith…the faculty of concentration…the faculty of wisdom…the faculty of mind not arise?

original: Rūpāvacarānaṁ arūpāvacarānaṁ ye ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti
analyzed: rūpāvacarānam arūpāvacarānam ye ca purisāḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti
translated: In the case of those in the form and formless worlds, and those who, having manifested this or that form, will attain final Nibbāna from there,

original: tesaṁ tattha itthindriyaṁ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati.
analyzed: tesam tattha itthi indriyam na uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha manindriyam na uppajjissati
translated: the faculty of femininity does not arise there, but the faculty of mind does not not arise there.

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha itthindriyañca na uppajjissati manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam tesam tattha itthi indriyam ca na uppajjissati manindriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: Of those due to arise in the non-percipient realm, the female faculty will not arise there, and the mind faculty will not arise there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha itthindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti? Āmantā. (Itthindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha manindriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha itthi indriyam na uppajjissati iti āmantā itthi indriya mūlaka
translated: Or, of those in whom the mind faculty will not arise, in them the female faculty will not arise?

original: Yassa yattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha jīvitindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?🔽Rūpāvacarānaṁ arūpāvacarānaṁ yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
analyzed: yassa yattha purisa indriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha jīvitindriyam na uppajjissati iti  yā ca itthiyo etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā
translated: Of those in whom the male faculty will not arise, in them the life faculty will not arise?

original: parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ tattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha🔽jīvitindriyaṁ na uppajjissati. Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ tattha purisindriyañca na
analyzed: parinibbāyissanti tesam tattha purisa indriyam na uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha  jīvita indriyam na uppajjissati pacchimabhavikānam tesam tattha purisa indriyam ca na
translated: Of those in the fine-material and immaterial realms, and of those women who, having shown the way in this very existence, will attain final Nibbāna there, the male faculty will not arise there, but not because of that

original: uppajjissati jīvitindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjissati jīvitindriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: will the life faculty not arise there. Of those due to arise in the last existence, the male faculty will not arise there, and the life faculty will not arise there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha jīvitindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha jīvitindriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha purisa indriyam na uppajjissati iti āmantā
translated: Or, where the faculty of life is not found, is the faculty of man not found there?

original: Yassa yattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha somanassindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?🔽Rūpāvacarānaṁ yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā somanassena upapajjitvā
analyzed: yassa yattha purisa indriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha somanassa indriyam na uppajjissati iti  yā ca itthiyo etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā somanassena upapajjitvā
translated: Where the faculty of man is not found, is the faculty of sorrow not found there?

original: parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ tattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: parinibbāyissanti tesam tattha purisa indriyam na uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha
translated: In the case of those women of the form-world who, after manifesting themselves in this way, are reborn with joy and attain final Nibbāna without having to return to this world, the faculty of man is not found there, but

original: somanassindriyaṁ na uppajjissati. Pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ arūpānaṁ
analyzed: somanassindriyam na uppajjissati pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam arūpānam
translated: the faculty of sorrow is found there. In the five-constituent existence, in the last existence, in the case of those beings who are without consciousness, in the formless world,

original: yā ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti
analyzed: yā ca itthiyaḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti
translated: in the case of those women who, after manifesting themselves in this way, are reborn with equanimity and attain final Nibbāna without having to return to this world,

original: tesaṁ tattha purisindriyañca na uppajjissati somanassindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: tesam tattha purisa indriyam ca na uppajjissati somanassa indriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: the faculty of man is not found there, and the faculty of sorrow is not found there.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha somanassindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha purisindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha somanassa indriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha purisa indriyam na uppajjissati iti

analyzed: ye purisāḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti

analyzed: tesam tattha somanassa indriyam na uppajjissati no ca tesam tattha purisa indriyam na  uppajjissati pañcavokāre pacchimabhavikānam asaññasattānam arūpānam yā ca itthiyo
