original: no ca tesaṁ tattha upekkhindriyaṁ na uppajjati. Upekkhāsampayuttapacchimacittassa
analyzed: no ca tesam tattha upekkhindriyam na uppajjati upekkhā sampayutta pacchima cittassa
translated: but not so their equanimity faculty.

original: bhaṅgakkhaṇe somanassasampayuttapacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṁ asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha
analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe somanassa sampayutta pacchima citta samaṅgīnam asaññasattānam tesam tattha
translated: At the moment of the dissolution of the last consciousness of those possessing the last kind of consciousness accompanied by joy,

original: manindriyañca na uppajjissati upekkhindriyañca na uppajjati. (Upekkhindriyamūlakaṁ.)🔽Yassa yattha saddhindriyaṁ na uppajjati tassa tattha paññindriyaṁ …pe… manindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: manindriyam ca na uppajjissati upekkhindriyam ca na uppajjati upekkhindriya mūlaka  yassa yattha saddhi indriyam na uppajjati tassa tattha paññindriyam pe manindriyam na uppajjissati iti
translated: and of those non-percipient beings, the mind faculty has not arisen that will arise, and the equanimity faculty has not arisen that will arise.🔽(The section based on the equanimity faculty should be treated in the same way as that based on the mind faculty.)🔽When someone’s faith faculty has not arisen, has his understanding faculty … his mind faculty not arisen?

original: Sabbesaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe saddhāvippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha🔽saddhindriyaṁ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati. Pacchimacittassa
analyzed: sabbesam cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe saddhā vippayutta cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tesam tattha  saddhindriyam na uppajjati no ca tesam tattha manindriyam na uppajjissati pacchimacittassa
translated: At the moment of the dissolution of consciousness of all those in whom the faith faculty is not arisen, and at the moment of the arising of the consciousness not accompanied by faith of those in whom the faith faculty has arisen,🔽the faith faculty has not arisen that will arise, but not so their mind faculty.

original: bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha saddhindriyañca na uppajjati manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe asaññasattānam tesam tattha saddhindriyam ca na uppajjati manindriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: At the moment of the dissolution of the last kind of consciousness of those in whom the faith faculty has arisen, and of those non-percipient beings, the faith faculty has not arisen that will arise, and the mind faculty has not arisen that will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha saddhindriyaṁ na uppajjatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha man indriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha saddhindriyam na uppajjati iti
translated: Or, if anyone’s mind faculty does not arise in any given case, his faith faculty will not arise in that case?

original: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha saddhindriyaṁ na uppajjati. Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ
analyzed: pacchimacittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tesam tattha manindriyam na uppajjissati no ca tesam  tattha saddhi indriyam na uppajjati pacchima cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe asaññasattānam
translated: At the moment of the arising of the last kind of consciousness in an arahat, in the case of those in whom the mind faculty does not arise,🔽their faith faculty does not arise. At the moment of the arising of the last kind of consciousness in an arahat, in the case of those in whom the mind faculty does not arise, their faith faculty does not arise.

original: tattha manindriyañca na uppajjissati saddhindriyañca na uppajjati. (Saddhindriyamūlakaṁ.)🔽Yassa yattha paññindriyaṁ na uppajjati tassa tattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissatīti?🔽Sabbesaṁ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ñāṇavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha paññindriyaṁ
analyzed: tattha manindriyam ca na uppajjissati saddhindriyam ca na uppajjati saddhindriya mūlaka  yassa yattha paññindriyam na uppajjati tassa tattha manindriyam na uppajjissati iti  sabbesam cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe ñāṇa vippayutta cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tesam tattha paññindriya
translated: In the case of those in whom the mind faculty does not arise, their faith faculty does not arise.🔽In the case of those in whom the understanding faculty does not arise, their mind faculty will not arise.

original: na uppajjati, no ca tesaṁ tattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati. Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe
analyzed: na uppajjati no ca tesam tattha manindriyam na uppajjissati pacchimacittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe
translated: At the moment of the arising of the last kind of consciousness in an arahat, in the case of those in whom the understanding faculty does not arise, their mind faculty does not arise.

original: asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ tattha paññindriyañca na uppajjati manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
analyzed: asaññasattānam tesam tattha paññindriyam ca na uppajjati manindriyam ca na uppajjissati
translated: of those in the non-percipient realm, the faculty of mind and the faculty of understanding will not arise.

original: Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati tassa tattha paññindriyaṁ na uppajjatīti?🔽Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṁ tattha manindriyaṁ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṁ🔽tattha paññindriyaṁ na uppajjati. Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattānaṁ tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa vā pana yattha manindriyam na uppajjissati tassa tattha paññindriyam na uppajjati iti  pacchimacittassa uppāda kkhaṇe tesam tattha manindriyam na uppajjissati no ca tesam  tattha paññindriyam na uppajjati pacchimacittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe asaññasattānam
translated: Or, if the faculty of mind does not arise in any given instance, the faculty of understanding will not arise there either?🔽At the moment of the arising of the last consciousness, the faculty of mind will not arise there, but the faculty of understanding will arise there.

original: tattha manindriyañca na uppajjissati paññindriyañca na uppajjati. (Paññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: tattha manindriyam ca na uppajjissati paññindriyam ca na uppajjati paññindriya mūlaka
translated: At the moment of the arising of the last consciousness, and at the moment of the arising of the first consciousness in the rebirth-linking of those in the non-percipient realm, the faculty of mind and the faculty of understanding will not arise.

original: 10.2.1.6. Atītānāgatavāra
translated: .... The past and future method

original: 10.2.1.6.1. Anulomapuggala
analyzed: anuloma puggala
translated: .... The direct method: individuals

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa sotindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa sotindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: “Those in whom the eye faculty has arisen: has the ear faculty arisen in them?”

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca arūpaṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca arūpam upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cakkhu indriya
translated: Those in the last phase of becoming, and those who, having been reborn in the immaterial realms, will attain final Nibbāna there, the eye faculty has arisen in them.

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ sotindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam sotindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhundriyam ca
translated: for some of them the eye faculty will arise, but not the ear faculty.

original: uppajjittha sotindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha sotindriyañca uppajjissati
translated: for them the eye faculty has arisen, but the ear faculty will arise. For the rest, for them both the eye faculty and the ear faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana sotindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana sotindriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: For whom the ear faculty will arise, has the eye faculty arisen?

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca rūpāvacaraṁ arūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa ghāna indriyam uppajjissati iti  pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesa
translated: For whom the eye faculty has arisen, will the nose faculty arise?

original: cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ
analyzed: cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha no ca tesam ghāna indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam
translated: For those in their last existence, and for those being reborn spontaneously in the Pure Abodes, for them the eye faculty has arisen, but the nose faculty will not arise. For the rest, for them both the eye faculty and the nose faculty will arise.

original: cakkhundriyañca uppajjittha ghānindriyañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana ghānindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: cakkhu indriyañca uppajjittha ghāna indriyañca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana ghāna indriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: For whom the nose faculty will arise, has the eye faculty arisen?

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa itthi indriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: For whom the eye faculty has arisen, will the femininity faculty arise?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca rūpāvacaraṁ arūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti ye
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti ye
translated: Of those due to reappear in a later existence, those who will attain Nibbāna in the Fine Material Sphere or the Immaterial Sphere after having reappeared,

original: ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ
analyzed: ca purisāḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cakkhu indriya
translated: and those who will attain Nibbāna in the Fine Material Sphere or the Immaterial Sphere after having shown the Path in this very existence, for them the eye faculty

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam itthi indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhu indriyam ca
translated: arises, but not the femininity faculty. For the rest, for them the eye faculty

original: uppajjittha itthindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha itthi indriyañca uppajjissati
translated: arises and the femininity faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana itthi indriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: But if the femininity faculty arises in anyone, does his eye faculty arise?🔽Those who are due to reappear in a later existence, and those women who will attain Nibbāna in the Fine Material Sphere or the Immaterial Sphere after having shown the Path in this very existence, for them the eye faculty🔽arises, but not the masculinity faculty. For the rest, for them the eye faculty🔽arises and the masculinity faculty will arise.

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa purisindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa purisa indriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: But if the masculinity faculty arises in anyone, does his eye faculty arise?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca rūpāvacaraṁ arūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā🔽ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā  ca itthiyaḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cakkhu indriya
translated: Those who are due to reappear in a later existence, and those men who will attain Nibbāna in the Fine Material Sphere or the Immaterial Sphere after having shown the Path in this very existence, for them the eye faculty🔽arises, but not the femininity faculty. For the rest, for them the eye faculty

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam purisa indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhu indriyam ca
translated: arises and the femininity faculty will arise.

original: uppajjittha purisindriyañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: uppajjittha purisa indriyañca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana purisa indriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: or the male faculty will arise.🔽But if the male faculty will arise, does the eye faculty arise?

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa jīvitindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: If the eye faculty arises, will the life faculty arise?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjittha jīvitindriyañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam cakkhundriyam uppajjittha no ca tesam jīvitindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhundriyam ca uppajjittha jīvitindriyam ca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana jīvitindriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: For those in their last existence, the eye faculty arises, but the life faculty will not arise. For the rest, the eye faculty arises and the life faculty will arise.

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa somanassindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa somanassa indriyam uppajjissati iti  pacchimabhavikānam ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cakkhu indriya
translated: But if the life faculty will arise, does the eye faculty arise?🔽If the eye faculty arises, will the joy faculty arise?

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ somanassindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam somanassa indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhu indriyam ca
translated: For those in their last existence, for those who attain Nibbāna without exertion, for those who attain Nibbāna with exertion, and for those reborn in the Pure Abodes, the eye faculty arises, but the joy faculty will not arise. For the rest, the eye faculty arises and the joy faculty will arise.

original: uppajjittha somanassindriyañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: uppajjittha somanassa indriyañca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana somanassa indriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: and the joy faculty has arisen.🔽“Or, when someone’s joy faculty will arise, has his eye faculty arisen?”

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa upekkhindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa upekkhindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: “When someone’s eye faculty has arisen, will his equanimity faculty arise?”

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ🔽uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam cakkhu indriya  uppajjittha no ca tesam upekkhindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhundriyam ca
translated: Those who are due to reappear in the next existence with joy and will then attain …

original: uppajjittha upekkhindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha upekkhindriyañca uppajjissati
translated: his eye faculty has arisen and his equanimity faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana upekkhindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana upekkhā indriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: “Or, when someone’s equanimity faculty will arise, has his eye faculty arisen?”

original: Yassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa saddhindriyaṁ …pe… paññindriyaṁ …pe… manindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa cakkhu indriyam uppajjittha tassa saddhindriyam pe paññindriyam pe manindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: “When someone’s eye faculty has arisen, will his faith faculty … his mindfulness faculty … his concentration faculty … his wisdom faculty … his mind faculty arise?”

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ manindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ cakkhundriyañca uppajjittha manindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam cakkhundriyam uppajjittha no ca tesam manindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam cakkhundriyam ca uppajjittha manindriyam ca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of those of them who are in their last existence, their eye-faculty has arisen, but their mind-faculty will not arise. In the case of the rest of them, their eye-faculty has arisen and their mind-faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana manindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yassa vā pana manindriyam uppajjissati tassa cakkhundriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā cakkhundriya mūlaka
translated: Or, in the case of those whose mind-faculty will arise, has their eye-faculty arisen?

original: Yassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca rūpāvacaraṁ arūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti ye🔽ca purisā eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ🔽uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca
analyzed: yassa gha an indriyam uppajjittha tassa itthi indriyam uppajjissati iti  pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti ye  ca purisāḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesam ghāna indriya  uppajjittha no ca tesam itthi indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghāna indriyam ca
translated: In the case of those whose nose-faculty has arisen, will their femininity-faculty arise?

original: uppajjittha itthindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha itthi indriyañca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of those of them who are in their last existence, their nose-faculty has arisen, but their femininity-faculty will not arise. In the case of the rest of them, their nose-faculty has arisen and their femininity-faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana itthindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana itthi indriyam uppajjissati tassa gha an indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: Or, if the femininity faculty has arisen in anyone, has the nose faculty arisen in him?

original: Yassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa purisindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa ghāna indriyam uppajjittha tassa purisa indriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: If the nose faculty has arisen in anyone, will the masculinity faculty arise in him?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca rūpāvacaraṁ arūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā
translated: In those in the last stage of life, and in those who will make an end without having reappeared in the Fine Material Sphere or the Immaterial Sphere,

original: ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ🔽uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca
analyzed: ca itthiyaḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesam ghāna indriya  uppajjittha no ca tesam purisa indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghāna indriyam ca
translated: and in women who will make an end in that same existence after showing the way in that same existence, the nose faculty has arisen,

original: uppajjittha purisindriyañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: uppajjittha purisa indriyañca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana purisa indriyam uppajjissati tassa gha an indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: but not the masculinity faculty. In the others the nose faculty has arisen and the masculinity faculty will arise.🔽Or, if the masculinity faculty will arise in anyone, has the nose faculty arisen in him?

original: Yassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa ghāna indriyam uppajjittha tassa jīvitindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: If the nose faculty has arisen in anyone, will the life faculty arise in him?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca uppajjittha jīvitindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam ghāna indriyam uppajjittha no ca tesam jīvitindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghāna indriyam ca uppajjittha jīvitindriyam ca uppajjissati
translated: For those in the second and third phases of the intermediate existence whose nose-faculty has arisen, their life-faculty will not arise. For the rest, their nose-faculty and life-faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana jīvita indriyam uppajjissati tassa gha anindriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: Or, for those whose life-faculty will arise, will their nose-faculty arise? Yes.

original: Yassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa somanassindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa gha an indriyam uppajjittha tassa somanassa indriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: For those whose nose-faculty arises, will their joy-faculty arise?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam ghāna indriya
translated: For those in the second and third phases of the intermediate existence who are attaining the third absorption and are attaining the fourth absorption, their nose-faculty

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ somanassindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam somanassindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghānindriyam ca
translated: arises, but their joy-faculty will not arise. For the rest, their nose-faculty

original: uppajjittha somanassindriyañca uppajjissati.🔽Yassa vā pana somanassindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: uppajjittha somanassa indriyañca uppajjissati  yassa vā pana somanassa indriyam uppajjissati tassa gha an indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: and joy-faculty will arise.🔽Or, for those whose joy-faculty will arise, will their nose-faculty arise? Yes.

original: Yassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa upekkhindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa ghāna indriyam uppajjittha tassa upekkhindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: For those whose nose-faculty arises, will their equanimity-faculty arise?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca somanassena upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam ghāna indriya
translated: Of those who are percipient of unity and are due to arise in a happy destiny, for them the nose faculty has arisen and will arise.

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca🔽uppajjittha upekkhindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam upekkhindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghānindriyam ca  uppajjittha upekkhindriyañca uppajjissati
translated: For those who are percipient of unity and are due to arise in a happy destiny, for them the nose faculty has arisen and will arise, but not for them will the equanimity faculty arise. For the rest, for them the nose faculty has arisen and the equanimity faculty will arise.🔽But for those for whom the equanimity faculty will arise, has their nose faculty arisen?

original: Yassa vā pana upekkhindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.🔽Yassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa saddhindriyaṁ …pe… paññindriyaṁ …pe… manindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa vā pana upekkhā indriyam uppajjissati tassa gha anindriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā  yassa gha an indriyam uppajjittha tassa saddhindriyam pe paññindriyam pe manindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: For those for whom the nose faculty has arisen, will their faith faculty …🔽will their energy faculty … will their mindfulness faculty … will their concentration faculty … will their understanding faculty … will their bodily pleasure faculty … will their bodily pain faculty … will their mental joy faculty … will their mental grief faculty … will their equanimity faculty arise?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ manindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ ghānindriyañca uppajjittha manindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam ghāna indriyam uppajjittha no ca tesam manindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam ghāna indriyam ca uppajjittha manindriyam ca uppajjissati
translated: For those who are percipient of unity and are due to arise in a happy destiny, for them the nose faculty has arisen and will arise, but not for them will the equanimity faculty arise. For the rest, for them the nose faculty has arisen and the equanimity faculty will arise.

original: Yassa vā pana manindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa ghānindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā. (Ghānindriyamūlakaṁ.)
analyzed: yassa vā pana man indriyam uppajjissati tassa ghāna indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā ghāna indriya mūlaka
translated: But for those for whom the equanimity faculty will arise, has their nose faculty arisen?

original: Yassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa purisindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?🔽Pacchimabhavikānaṁ ye ca rūpāvacaraṁ arūpāvacaraṁ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā🔽ca itthiyo eteneva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesaṁ itthindriyaṁ
analyzed: yassa itthi indriyam uppajjittha tassa purisa indriyam uppajjissati iti  pacchimabhavikānam ye ca rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti yā  ca itthiyaḥ etena iva bhāvena katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissanti tesam itthi indriya
translated: When the femininity faculty has arisen, has the masculinity faculty arisen?

original: uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ itthindriyañca🔽uppajjittha purisindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam purisa indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam itthi indriyam ca  uppajjittha purisa indriyañca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of those in the last stage of life, and those who will be reborn in the form and formless worlds, and those women who will attain Nibbāna in this very life, the femininity faculty has arisen, but the masculinity faculty has not arisen. In the case of the rest, both the femininity faculty and the masculinity faculty have arisen.

original: Yassa vā pana purisindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana purisa indriyam uppajjissati tassa itthi indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: Or when the masculinity faculty has arisen, has the femininity faculty arisen?

original: Yassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjittha tassa jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissatīti?
analyzed: yassa itthi indriyam uppajjittha tassa jīvitindriyam uppajjissati iti
translated: When the femininity faculty has arisen, has the life faculty arisen?

original: Pacchimabhavikānaṁ tesaṁ itthindriyaṁ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissati. Itaresaṁ tesaṁ itthindriyañca uppajjittha jīvitindriyañca uppajjissati.
analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam tesam itthi indriyam uppajjittha no ca tesam jīvitindriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam itthi indriyam ca uppajjittha jīvitindriyam ca uppajjissati
translated: In the case of those in the last stage of life, the femininity faculty has arisen, but the life faculty has not arisen. In the case of the rest, both the femininity faculty and the life faculty have arisen.

original: Yassa vā pana jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjissati tassa itthindriyaṁ uppajjitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yassa vā pana jīvita indriyam uppajjissati tassa itthi indriyam uppajjittha ati āmantā
translated: Or, if the life faculty has arisen in anyone, has the femininity faculty arisen in that one?

analyzed: yassa itthi indriyam uppajjittha tassa somanassa indriyam uppajjissati iti

analyzed: pacchimabhavikānam ye ca upekkhāya upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti tesam itthi indriya

analyzed: uppajjittha no ca tesam somanassa indriyam uppajjissati itaresam tesam itthi indriyam ca

analyzed: pacchima citta samaṅgīnam yassa cittassa anantarā upekkhā sampayutta pacchima cittam uppajjissati
